trans-unit.source: Different JDBC drivers are available depending on the environment you choose for <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: Different JDBC drivers are available depending on the environment you choose for <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

target.mrk: Different JDBC drivers are available depending on the environment you choose for <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: A driver for embedded environments, when <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> runs in the same JVM as the application.

seg-source.mrk: A driver for embedded environments, when <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> runs in the same JVM as the application.

target.mrk: A driver for embedded environments, when <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> runs in the same JVM as the application.

trans-unit.source: A driver for the Network Server environment. The Network Server sets up a client/server environment.

seg-source.mrk: A driver for the Network Server environment.
The Network Server sets up a client/server environment.

target.mrk: A driver for the Network Server environment.
The Network Server sets up a client/server environment.
